text: Raffaele Masciocchi was an Italian cinematographer.Weisser p.181 ==Selected filmography== * Destiny (1951) * Daughters of Destiny (1954) * Lazzarella (1957) * The Sword and the Cross (1958) * Tuppe tuppe, Marescià! (1958) * Hannibal (1959) * Queen of the Pirates (1960) * The Giants of Thessaly (1960) * Robin Hood and the Pirates (1960) * Sword of the Conqueror (1961) * Battle of the Worlds (1961) * The Seventh Sword (1962) * Charge of the Black Lancers (1962) * The Magnificent Adventurer (1963) * The Ghost (1963) * Gold for the Caesars (1963) * Hercules Against the Barbarians (1964) * Revenge of The Gladiators (1964) * James Tont operazione U.N.O. (1965) == References == == Bibliography == * Thomas Weisser.
